page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: {CRAIGIEVAR SCHOOL INTERESTS COMMITTEE} There are twelve parents and teachers on the committee. They organise fund raising activities like fetes, barbecues and sales. With the money they but equipment for us at school like our computer and video recorder. They pay for Santa's expenses at our Christmas party and for our summer outing. {CRAIGIEVAR SCHOOL PLAYGROUP} There are eleven children at playgroup. They begin at three years old. Sometimes the nine toddlers join them for their meetings which are twice a week. Mothers supervise as they paint, play with water and sand, build with bricks and hear stories. They do handwork too.
